title: # 496 - Fortune Feimster, LeeAnn Kreischer & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Fortune Feimster and my wife LeeAnn. We talk about Chelsea and Jo Koy, blue collar vs white collar, manners, The Cabin, mean teenagers, and much more 

 

Catch Fortune on tour in your city. Go to https://www.fortunefeimster.com for tickets! 

 

Follow Fortune here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fortunefeimster 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/fortunefunny 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mack Weldon. Go to http://www.mackweldon.com/bert and use the code “Bert” at checkout for 20% off your first order.

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code “BERT” at http://www.Manscaped.com  

 

This episode is also brought to you by BetQL. Tune in to The Daily Tip presented by BetMGM. Listen weekdays, 6 am to 9 am Eastern, on Audacy, Spotify, or your favorite podcast app. 

 

This episode is brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go to http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Black Buffalo. Go to http://www.blackbuffalo.com and use the code “BERTCAST” at checkout for 25% off your first order 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Athletic Greens. Get 1 year of vitamin D and 5 free travel packs with your first purchase at http://www.athleticgreens.com/bert 

 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
